content: what s halloween without candy corn instead of giving out candy to trick or treaters you can give crochet candy corn made from my crochet candy corn pattern the best part is that they are super easy to make **materials** ▢red heart yarn - yellow ▢red heart yarn - pumpkin ▢red heart yarn - white ▢4 mm hook ▢polyfil ▢safety eyes ▢if doing zombie or frankenstein candy corn you will need 3 shades of purple or 2 shades of green and black yarn **abbreviations us terms ** for the classic candy corn magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet chain - chain increase - increase decrease - decrease if doing the other crochet candy corn with costumes bobble stitch double_crochet - double_crochet picot slip_stitch - slip_stitch
